title: Turkish vs Azerbaijani (How SIMILAR are they?)

media:group.media:title: Turkish vs Azerbaijani (How SIMILAR are they?)
media:group.media:description:
In this video I compare two closely related Turkic languages: Turkish and Azerbaijani. 

►Learn a language with native teachers online using italki: http://go.italki.com/1Ojye8x

Special thanks to the following people:

Abdullahzeki Ilgun - consultant and Turkish audio samples
Rza İsmayıl - Azerbaijani audio samples
